headline: Assessing W. R. Berkley After 14.1% Pullback and Specialty Insurance Expansion in 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether W. R. Berkley is attractively priced after its recent run, you are not alone. This article is designed to unpack what the current share price really implies. The stock has pulled back sharply in the short term, down 14.1% over the last week and 10.7% over the last month. Yet it is still up 15.0% year to date and 157.4% over five years, which hints that the recent drop might say more about market sentiment than long term fundamentals. Recent headlines have...
